default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^I bring you a powerful magical staff...
^It was a toothpick, yes. But now? It’s a staff!
^Very powerful, it could break the sea in two! True fact! For real now. Pleaaase buy it?
^AAAaaaA! Be very careful while handling it, yes?

c-0: ^Yes, you know? That thing you use to remove any extra food in between your teeth after a meal? It's never been used, I swear!
c-1: ^Yes, please avoid touching the tip of it!

b: ^This amount satisfies me, child. Do me a favor... don’t put it in your mouth... unless you enjoy instant regret.
c: ^What? Only this? Do you think my mighty staff is a joke? Hmph, I’m leaving!
d: ^You offer coins you do not have! This is blasphemy! Or worse, rudeness! I cannot bargain with such unprofessional people!
e: ^... Why would you refuse? It is so powerful... Give it back! WAIT! Don't touch the tip of it!
f: ^Hmm... this amount does not satisfy me... Is there a way to do better?
g: ^No no, that’s truly not the case! My staff is lacking nothing in this area!
i: ^Fine... you win. There is poison on it... I will give it to you for the offered amount...
